name: kgsearch
title: Knowledge Graph Search API
description: Searches the Google Knowledge Graph for entities.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

schemas.name: SearchResponse
schemas.desc:
Response message includes the context and a list of matching results
which contain the detail of associated entities.

fields.name: itemListElement
fields.desc: The item list of search results.

methods.name: search
methods.desc:
Searches Knowledge Graph for entities that match the constraints.
A list of matched entities will be returned in response, which will be in
JSON-LD format and compatible with http://schema.org

optinalQueryParams.name: types
optinalQueryParams.desc:
Restricts returned entities with these types, e.g. Person
(as defined in http://schema.org/Person). If multiple types are specified,
returned entities will contain one or more of these types.

optinalQueryParams.name: languages
optinalQueryParams.desc:
The list of language codes (defined in ISO 693) to run the query with,
e.g. 'en'.

optinalQueryParams.name: ids
optinalQueryParams.desc:
The list of entity id to be used for search instead of query string.
To specify multiple ids in the HTTP request, repeat the parameter in the
URL as in ...?ids=A&ids=B

optinalQueryParams.name: limit
optinalQueryParams.desc: Limits the number of entities to be returned.

optinalQueryParams.name: prefix
optinalQueryParams.desc: Enables prefix match against names and aliases of entities

optinalQueryParams.name: query
optinalQueryParams.desc: The literal query string for search.
